summary: A couple has a machine that gives the paraplegic wife different degrees of mind and body control of other people, allowing her to feel the sexual pleasure that women sleeping with her husband feel. Emmanuelle joins the testing.
cast: Holly Sampson|Shauna O'Brien|Lyle Skosey|Brandy Miller|Jason Schnuit|John McCafferty|Carlos Milano|Griffin Drew|Robert Donavan|Cecilia Bergqvist|Brad Bartram|Nancy Vee|Tre Temptor|Tiffany Shepis|Timothy Stempien|Gabriella Hall
title: Emmanuelle 2000: Emmanuelle's Intimate Encounters
